value.string:
DELETE FROM
 syncml
 WHERE
 <dtml-in path>
 path=<dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="string"><dtml-if sequence-end><dtml-else> OR </dtml-if>
 </dtml-in>
 ;
 <dtml-var "'\0'">
 INSERT INTO
 syncml
 VALUES
 <dtml-in prefix="loop" expr="_.range(_.len(path))">
 (
 <dtml-sqlvar expr="gid[loop_item]" type="string">,
 <dtml-sqlvar expr="path[loop_item]" type="string">,
 <dtml-sqlvar expr="validation_state[loop_item]" type="string">
 )<dtml-unless sequence-end>,</dtml-unless>
 </dtml-in>
